#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
#define si(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sf(a) scanf("%f",&a)
#define sc(a) scanf("%c",&a)
#define ss(a) scanf("%s",&a)
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define pi(a) printf("%d",a)
#define pf(a) printf("%f",a)
#define pc(a) printf("%c",a)
#define ps(a) printf("%s",a)
int gcd(int a,int b)
{return (b==0)?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
int main()
{

    int i,c,g,k,N,M;
    //freopen("input.in","r",stdin);
    si(k);
    while(k--)
    {
        si(N);
        si(M);
      /*  c=0;
        if(N%M!=0)
        {
            if(N>M)N=N%M;
            g=gcd(N,M);
            if(g==1)
            c=(M-1);
            else
            c=(g*((M/g)-1));
        }
*/
        printf("%d\n",M-gcd(N,M));
    }
    return 0;
}
